tweet: This is HUGE! Not only did these researchers formalise Monero’s RingCT as a cryptographic primitive, with associated proofs, but they invented an improvement called Omniring, which would massively improve Monero’s already-excellent privacy!  https://t.co/pbTZSLN5EG
